ChunkText: short trips to canada, mexico or some caribbean islands with an expired f-1 visa automatic visa revalidation students who have a valid I-20 and are in good f-1 status, but whose visa has expired, are able to take short trips less than 30 days to countries neighboring the US to canada, mexico and some caribbean islands.
ContextBefore: for a complete list of US embassy locations around the world, please note, individuals from countries considered by the US government to be state sponsors of terrorism may be limited in where they can apply. it is not possible to apply for a US visa from within the us.
ContextAfter: please request a letter from isss if you plan to use this method of travel, as sometimes the border guards dont recall this exception and a letter that cites this regulation will help make sure you have a smooth return to the us.
